text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
One day, I want to stand on the stage 
of a victory concert, and show my fans 
how much I love them!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
I wish I could stand in the center of that 
stage, singing out my thanks from the 
bottom of my heart!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: Some day… I'll have my chance!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
…Sorry. I'm so sorry…… 
I couldn't win… again……!

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text:
…Regardless of when, or if, they will 
come true, all horsegirls harbor their 
own dreams.

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text:
The bright spotlights don't lend their 
sparkling glow to every part of the stage.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, well, why not! The live concert 
element is worth closer analysis!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'm… not really sure. 
Do we even really need concerts…?

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text:
I'd like this Grand Live… 
to bring people together.

Link hands & shine bright. 
Our Grand Live!
